summary_detail.value: Today, Glacier National Park Rangers are issuing an Evacuation Warning for the south end of Lake McDonald north to Logan Pass. This warning includes North McDonald Road. This warning DOES NOT include the Apgar area. The Going-to-the-Sun Road will remain OPEN. Trails and campgrounds in the area will be closed on Sunday. See 9/2/17 Update for specific

title: Evacuation Warning for Sprague Fire Area (Sprague Fire Wildfire)
